project.description: This job is managed by JJB! Changes must be done in git

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, name of the QA cloud server as integer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: tempest
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional, specify what tempest test(s) to run, e.g. smoke, smoke|full or smoke|defcore

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cct
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional, specify cct tests to run

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ssl_type
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, set the SSL configuration for the cloud, available options: no-ssl, ssl-insecure, ssl

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cloud_version
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory, version of the cloud to be installed as integer

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: upgrade_cloudsource
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set new cloudsource for upgrade target

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: nodenumber
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of nodes to use. Depends on hw_number

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: runner_url
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The runner must be qa_crowbarsetup.sh file

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: commands
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: All the steps that needs to be completed to have cloud installed
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: prepareinstallcrowbar installcrowbar allocate waitcloud setup_aliases batch

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPDATEBEFOREINSTALL
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: add update repos before crowbar install

hudson.plugins.parameterizedtrigger.Pred.properties: hw_number=$hw_number tempest=$tempest cct_tests=$cct scenario_name=0a scenario_job_name=$JOB_NAME scenario_build_number=$BUILD_NUMBER
